mapper.sql: id, record_id, item_id, item_name, purchase_qty, purchase_price, purchase_money, expire_date, type_id, type_name, cleared, unit
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pension_purchase_detail
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pension_purchase_detail (id, record_id, item_id, item_name, purchase_qty, purchase_price, purchase_money, expire_date, type_id, type_name, cleared, unit ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into pension_purchase_detail
id,
record_id,
item_id,
item_name,
purchase_qty,
purchase_price,
purchase_money,
expire_date,
type_id,
type_name,
cleared,
unit,

mapper.update:
update pension_purchase_detail
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
record_id = #{record.recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_id = #{record.itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_name = #{record.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_qty = #{record.purchaseQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchase_price = #{record.purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL},
purchase_money = #{record.purchaseMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
expire_date = #{record.expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type_id = #{record.typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_name = #{record.typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pension_purchase_detail set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_id = #{record.recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_id = #{record.itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_name = #{record.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_qty = #{record.purchaseQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purchase_price = #{record.purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, purchase_money = #{record.purchaseMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, expire_date = #{record.expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type_id = #{record.typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_name = #{record.typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pension_purchase_detail
record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_qty = #{purchaseQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL},
purchase_money = #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pension_purchase_detail set record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_qty = #{purchaseQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, purchase_money = #{purchaseMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pd.id, pd.item_id as itemId, pd.item_name as itemName, pd.purchase_qty as purchaseQty, pd.purchase_price as purchasePrice, pd.purchase_money as purchaseMoney, pd.expire_date as expireDate, pd.type_id as typeId, pd.type_name as typeName, pd.cleared, pd.unit from pension_purchase_detail pd where pd.cleared=2 and pd.record_id=#{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select psd.item_id as itemId, psd.item_name as itemName, psd.purchase_price as purchasePrice, pdi.item_name as typeName, psd.type_id as typeId, psd.cleared, psd.expire_date as expireDate, sum(psd.out_qty )as purchaseQty, sum(psd.out_qty*psd.purchase_price) as purchaseMoney from pension_storageout_record pr, pension_storageout_detail psd, pension_dic_itemtype pdi where pr.id=psd.record_id and psd.type_id=pdi.id and pr.cleared=2 and pr.storageout_time >=#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and pr.storageout_time <date_add(#{endDate}, interval 1 day) group by psd.item_id, psd.item_name, psd.purchase_price, pdi.item_name, psd.type_id, psd.cleared, psd.expire_date
